title: American Routes 15th Anniversary Concert
teaser: featuring Irma Thomas, Jon Cleary, the Lost Bayou Ramblers and the Treme Brass Band
description: Celebrate the holiday week as American Routes turns 15! It's a live show from New Orleans legendary Rock N Bowl club, including soul, funk and R & B heroes Irma Thomas, Ivan Neville, James Rivers, Robert "Barefootin'" Parker, Walter "Wolfman" Washington and James Andrews all backed by pianist Jon Cleary and band. Also, the new Cajun rock sound from the Lost Bayou Ramblers, and the venerable traditional jazz of the Treme Brass Band. Feel free to dance along with the radio!
contentencoded: Celebrate the holiday week as American Routes turns 15! It's a live show from New Orleans legendary Rock N Bowl club, including soul, funk and R & B heroes Irma Thomas, Ivan Neville, James Rivers, Robert "Barefootin'" Parker, Walter "Wolfman" Washington and James Andrews all backed by pianist Jon Cleary and band. Also, the new Cajun rock sound from the Lost Bayou Ramblers, and the venerable traditional jazz of the Treme Brass Band. Feel free to dance along with the radio!
